contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 27, 2008 D Swiss Open
Swiss Open 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
swiss-open
Swiss Open Contest presented nearly 50 different Bands from 11 Countries in it's 25 Years of History till 2014. It was held in Kultur-Casino Bern first and since 1999 the 'Salle Blanche' in KKL Luzern provides a wonderful Frame for this popular Event.
See Also Contest Website: http://www.worldbandfestival.ch/ Switzerland
Set Test and Own Choice
Die Alpen
Kultur und Kongresszentrum (KKL), Luzern, Switzerland Best performance of contest march: Brass Band Fribourg Best own choice: Brass Band Treize Etoiles
April 19, 2009, 5:49 p.m. Aug. 18, 2015, 1:55 p.m.
1 Brass Band Treize Etoiles James Gourlay The Corsair
2 Oberaargauer Brass Band Manfred Obrecht Le Roi d'Ys
3 Brassband Bürgermusik Luzern Allan Withington Carnival Overture [Dvořák, arr. Brand]
4 Brass Band Fribourg Robert Childs The Sorcerer's Apprentice
5 Entlebucher Brass Band Michael Bach William Tell [unknown arranger]
6 Brass Band Luzern Land Herve Grelat The Flying Dutchman [arr. Lorriman]
7 Ensemble de Cuivres Valaisan Jean-François Bobillier Fingal's Cave
8 Wallberg Brass Band Russell Gray The Judges of the Secret Court (Les Francs Juges)
9 Ensemble de Cuivres Melodia Yvan Lagger The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright]
10 Musikgesellschaft Risch-Rotkreuz Rino Chiappori L'italiana in Algeri - overture [unknown arranger]
